article:
Do you have a great summer camp?l had a great one with my friends last year.
After saying goodbye to our _ ,we got on the bus, _ the way,we laughed and talked happily.After we got to the campground ,we jumped and ran around the place.This _ the first time we left home.Some of us felt homesick .However,when the night party and dances started.the homesickness was _ .
The next day.we went boating,At first,my friends and I worked hard,but the boat _ listen to us and wouldn't go to the right places.Then the guide _ us.After many times,we did it much better.Swimming is my favorite _ .It was about the hottest time of a day and the best time to stay in the _ water.The swimming guide was a funny man,and he often made us want to laugh.
What an interesting summer camp it was!
